</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #191: The Destiny War](/Sources.aspx?ID=199) pg. 72

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** carried

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_The Beating_ symbolizes attack from all sides. If you have _The Beating_ invested, whenever you and an ally are flanking a foe, your melee Strikes gain a +2 item bonus to damage. This increases to a +3 item bonus at 17th level.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You wave the card to conjure up dozens of violent ghostly figures; you cast [_pernicious poltergeist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=965), and the area of the spell is treated as difficult terrain in addition to its normal effects. The level of the spell is one-half your level, rounded down (minimum 6th level), and the save DC is your class DC.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
